course_title: Meaning in Transit: An Introduction to Translation Studies

prereq_course: 3 years of language instruction, TRST 301, or consent of instructor This course covers the theory and practice of audiovisual translation, including the core technical, linguistic, semiotic, and accessibility considerations needed to subtitle for television, cinema and DVD, and an overview of the profession
